overview: Mariam Si Manis Ancol Bridge (Diah Permatasari) and her best friend, Karina (Ozy Syahputra) saved Gilang (Ari Wibowo) whose spirit they found when her body was in a coma in the hospital because of an assassination attempt by Iwan (Dicky Wahyudi). Through a hilarious struggle against fellow spirits named Jin Volker (Udin Pumpkin), Gilang's life has finally been returned to his body and returned to normal life with his girlfriend, Nina who will be captured by Iwan
title: Si Manis Jembatan Ancol
